metadata.instructions: Claude: enumerate distinct meanings for each word, and fill the 'meanings' array below with entries conforming to the schema in CLAUDE.md and config.json (meaning_entry). Add any words to skip to the 'skipped_words' array.

meanings.MonolingualDef: usar la mente para formar ideas o tomar decisiones
meanings.ExampleSentence: El niño rubio piensa mucho durante el examen.
meanings.GappedSentence: El niño rubio _____ mucho durante el examen.
meanings.prompt: A blond boy in a large school exam with his own desk thinking very hard.

meanings.ExampleSentence: La casa grande está en la colina del bosque.
meanings.GappedSentence: La _____ grande está en la colina del bosque.
meanings.prompt: A large house on top of a hill with a forest either side and a long winding road approaching.

meanings.ExampleSentence: Una persona está sola en la multitud.
meanings.GappedSentence: Una _____ está sola en la multitud.
meanings.prompt: A stick man in a very large crowd with a small space around them on a white background.

meanings.ExampleSentence: El país tiene su bandera en el mapa.
meanings.GappedSentence: El _____ tiene su bandera en el mapa.
meanings.prompt: A large map of England with the English flag on the top of the country.
